1.0.name: wordpress/link-to-your-content
1.0.description:
The Link to Your Content plugin gives you more control over how you link to the content (real reach with the name I know) on your WordPress single and multi-site installs. Content such as:

  • Posts
  • Pages
  • Custom Post Types (optional)
  • Taxonomies (optional)
  • Documents
  • Images
  • Media (everything not in documents and images)
  • External Linkes (web sites or email addresses)
